        "follow": {
            "add": false

            "hold": "Value 1"

        "setting2": {
            "del": 200

        "setting3": {
            "del": true,
            "add": null
        },

            "add": "blah blah"
        },
        "setting5": {
            "add": {
                "key5": "value5"
            }
        },

            "doge": {
                "wow": {
                    "del": "",
                    "add": "so much"
                }
            },
            "key": {
                "hold": "value"
            },
            "ops": {
                "add": "vops"
            }
        }

        "baz": {
            "del": "bas",
            "add": "bars"
        },
        "foo": {
            "hold": "bar"
        },
        "nest": {
            "del": {
                "key": "value"
            },
            "add": "str"
        }

        "del": {
            "abc": 12345,
            "deep": {
                "id": 45
            }
        }
    },
    "group3": {
        "add": {
            "deep": {
                "id": {
                    "number": 45
                }
            },

    }
